attributes.title: Trump can only lose by massive fraud!
attributes.review: Great app ! Let's make America great again. Go trump

attributes.title: MAGA!
attributes.review: Awesome app to help the community contribute to a great cause!  I would love to see some iMessage stickers added!

attributes.title: MAGA
attributes.review: This app is a great way to stay up to date on your favorite candidate.

attributes.title: Connected
attributes.review: An excellent way for Trump to keep in touch with his supporters..

attributes.review: Nice way to follow the news without watching this biased leftist media

attributes.title: Great app!
attributes.review: I finally get to be like a democrat and vote twice...once in November and once at the App Store. MAGA!

attributes.title: Really cool app!
attributes.review: Trump wants to be connected to the people of this country. Really good app so far

attributes.title: Excellent App!
attributes.review: Keeps me informed and allows me to support my pick for POTUS!  Outstanding job

attributes.title: Don't we have the best apps?!?
attributes.review: We have the best apps, believe me. TRUMP 2016 Make America Great Again.
